keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Bernie Sanders’s challenge in strengthening his support beyond his largely white base was in stark relief as he campaigned before the state’s primary on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: In a Black Church in South Carolina, Sanders Struggles to Get an ‘Amen’
headline.main: In a Black Church in South Carolina, Bernie Sanders Struggles to Get an ‘Amen’

snippet: Bernie Sanders’s challenge in strengthening his support beyond his largely white base was in stark relief as he campaigned before the state’s primary on Saturday.
abstract: Democratic presidential candidate Sen Bernie Sanders' lukewarm reception at black church in Columbia, SC reflects his relative lack of support among African-Americans; supporters insist candidate is not giving up on South Carolina in favor of states with large working-class white populations, citing campaign's significant staff and expenses there.
